message.body: dormir cant be used in the infinate
what have you done so far?
I don't really care right now
speak to me in english then
how is west virginia? what have you done so far? how is cs?
I'll speak to you in whatever language I want!
do you think dan would go to a wedding with me
Dan would probably go to _your_ wedding with you
I think you're full of it
and for the record, I'm *not* with Liz
i know you arent with liz
you havent seen liz for ages
and what do you mean im full of it
I think that you still see a possible future with Dan
that wouldnt make me full of anything
i dont see a future with dan unless dan was a different person
um, yeah it would because you keep saying that you don't
i would need dan to be extremely different than who he is
you want me to say NEVER
but no that isnt what i want
and it isnt what i see happening
and why are you being a dick
I'm doing what I always do, what you always do
i told you this all before
"if you and i getting together is a stupid idea
i wanna go to costa rica.
all I am saying is, I get the impression that you haven't completely given up on Dan
contrary to what you have said
i dont wanna date dan andres
hes free to date whoever he would like to
you two have a strange relationship
i think we are just figuring out our relationship
we only knew each other one way
we are getting to know each other the other way
the shit he's said to me is just strange
about how he was interested in you again when he found out about your breakup
but its been a few months
i dont think things are the same as may
it's definitely been different since you left
remember the drive back from the beach?
as soon as you were gone, he changed
he was all about the co-op and his community stuff
he doesnt have anything else to BE all about
if he actually does like me
then it makes sense that hed be involved with what im up to
which he does, in his own special way
but if you two arent getting along
i dont know why hes all about the coop
we just don't know how to deal with each other
it's not that big of an issue for me
he's not doing this stuff to help others
I've learned a lot about him
and if he wants to stay at the co-op, then he needs to improve
to make him feel more useful
I'm not going to give him any more breaks
Kristin is tired of it as well
He complains about Kristin, always wanting him to do stuff
because she is the only one who stands up to him
when you said that about how you see Dan and I
and how your view of him improved vs. I
but i thought he was trying
yeah, that was one of the things that got me
I don't even know what to call what it is he does
but then I thought about when we met
you and I, and went out
and how careful I was to not hurt your feelings
you didnt call me for a week.
but you could have told me you werent interested
you needed to be a little pissed at me
this wasnt any plan of yours
you cant look back at it and make yourself into the hero
I didn't know you were to intimately aquainted with my thoughts
I never said anything about being a hero
i didnt know you were so careful regarding my feelings
I could have done a dozen other things
dont use my name like that.
and I chose my words very carefully
and you wonder why dan seemed to be looking better??
and I could have gone out with you again
because I knew that isn't what you wanted
the point is, the right thing to do isn't always easy
i appreciate you not using me
but when you said that stuff
I felt like none of it mattered
those things meant something to me
but i felt like they meant nothing to you
you act like I do things purposely to hurt you
you didnt do it to hurt me
ok, I will talk how you want me to
so why do you treat every action as if it's got something to do with you?
and now i feel bad for asking him
he said i should go alone
ill have an easier time meeting guys
I assume you're referring to you asking Dan to go to CR?
me asking dan to go to the wedding with me
if you thought he would go
and he got online so i asked him
he also said hes not comfortable meeting a lot of new people
and if they have already heard negative shit about him
you should be able to ask your friends questions
cause i should have known better.
i dont have a guy friend that would wanna go with me
he gave me the same response the other dan did
ill go if you really need me to go
I mean, if the situation where different I would go
as in I would go with you as friend, to a wedding
as I would go with a lot of my friends
I'm not allowed to have friends?
it would be different if I were invited to a wedding (I was) and I asked someone other than (the person I am _seeing_) to go
and i cant travel with you if youre seeing her
you said you werent really into her
when i asked you about her before i left
yeah in the most predicable ways
and I had asked her out a million years ago
and when she came back she was all over my jock
we don't even talk that much
Seems I down play, while you blow things out of proportion
I don't know why you care
I mean would you rather I not date? or see anyone?
i just kinda wanted to possibly travel
see, this is why I don't like rules
and i dont wanna be that girl
_if_ we decided to go on a trip together
and I'm away, and will be for a while
which means that i cant go
you can do whatever you want
I may have brought it up to her already
i dont wanna deal with relationships
if I said that, I would be a jerk
but sometimes, that is how I feel
I just don't really need the relationship part
and dont want to be in a relationship
that doesnt make you a jerk
doing things together, enjoying each others company
that sounds a lot like a relationship
but it doesnt have to be
can't it just be doing those things with someone you care about?
in the real world, it would be a bunch of jealous bitches and someone would get shot
and im one of those jealous bitches
i want everything you just said
but i do not want a relationship with you
seems like an issue, doesn't it
that i want to be with you
yes, but don't want to be at the same time
I'm fine with it, but I'm a fucking weirdo
its the same thing youre looking for
and im looking for that cause of where im at right now.

look, it's not as if I am adamantly apposed to being in a relationship in the future (not you, relax) it's just that I've been through this shit before and it just doesn't seem to work. I dont know if its me or not but it just doesn't seem very likely to happen, so I've lost the expectation
but it wont be with me
youll meet someone where it will just fit
yeah, well it hasn't in 33 years, so I'm not holding my breath
besides, I'm a fucking pain in the ass
and I'm just not willing to put up with all the bullshit that everyone else seems to
my thing is, if we like having sex, then we should
I can't think of a good reason not to
assuming we are single of course
and I can't think of any reason not to be single
and what's her face is leaving in less than a year
so why am I going to get into something serious?
but if you are exclusively having sex
yeah, that's the part I'm not sure of yet
yeah, I doubt that would happen
I'm not shit as far as I'm concerned
and not to be a dick, but claire needs to tell me what her intentions are, otherwise I'm assuming the same
you basially told me you were exclusive
because you knew she wasnt sleeping with anyone else
because I'm no longer talking to LIz
and you felt bad about sleeping with other people
oh, oh! Can I answer questions for you?
sometimes I like to sleep with people
_who_ I do it with is up to me
and yet i still wanna get on top of you
it's not like I am trying to boost my ego by sleeping with a different girl every night
therefore, spend time with, do things
why is that a difficult concept for people?
is the only way for this to work, is everyone has to be on the same page
which means everyone is doing what they want/sleeping with whoever they want
but then you'll have no reason to date
you would still be interested in other boys
your reason to date is to find a real relationship
if a real relationship materializes, great
I just wish everyone could be happy
but if its not an option
well I'm generally the wrong one to ask
I'd say you are less so
i dont want to hurt other people.
but he didnt have any say
I know, but it still doesn't matter
if it hurts, it hurts. you don't need a legit reason
fyi: I haven't been exclusive in over 2 years
but you told me a week ago
sorry if it came off like that
which is why i said it
im not making shit up here
I don't go that fast, I think I said that
it takes like months for me
id want to sleep with you
and on that relatively pathetic note
